contractObjectiveList.description: The ENEMYFACTION scum are trying to get from one place to another. Kill them.
contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Supply Convoy and Escape

contractObjectiveList.description: Send a message by not only destroy the convoy, but eliminate their escorts as well.
contractObjectiveList.title: Destroy the Convoy Guards

dialogueContent.words: All right, Commander, our goal is to track down the convoy...
...so let's scout out the target area. When we've found the convoy, we stop it from reaching its destination.
Then we make our way to the evac zone.
Mission accomplished. The fire support vehicles have been neutralized.
Nothing more to do here Commander, lets go home.
The target vehicles should be just ahead. Be careful commander, who knows what they're packing.
That's got it, primary target damaged. Keep on those ones.
The guard units are dealt with; a wise move.
Warning, Commander! The target vehicles have begun to arrive at their destination; not much time left before they escape!
One down. Keep engaging those threats and we'll be out of here.
The convoy is finished, now get what 'mechs you have to the extraction point and we'll pull you out. Move quickly.

longDescription: Commander, the targets will probably be on the slow and squishy side. But the reason we're being asked to hit them in transit, outside entrenched positions, is because they pack a punch.

objectiveList.description: The objective for destroying the convoy units.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy

objectiveList.description: The objective for destroying the units guarding the convoy.
objectiveList.title: Destroy the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Guards

objectiveList.description: The objective for preventing the enemy from reaching their escape point, if this happens the player will lose.
objectiveList.title: Stop Convoy from Escaping

objectiveList.description: The objective for the player to intercept/observe the enemy convoy.
objectiveList.title: Recon the Convoy's Route

objectiveList.description: The objective for the player units escaping and finishing the mission.
objectiveList.title: Get to the Evac Zone

objectiveList.description: The objective for killing the additional units that ambush you.
objectiveList.title: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

shortDescription: A {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} detachment of fire support vehicles is on the move to a strategic location. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} would prefer that they do not reach their destination.
